Detailed Description

2d sprite render's transformations.

Stores transformation parameters for rendering Sprite2D objects.

Member Function Documentation

Bool CheckFlag (  Int  f  ) 
 

Check one specified control render sprite flag.

Parameters:
f define specified control render sprite flag to check.
Returns:
Return True if flag is set else False.

Parameters:
f define specified control render sprite flag to clear.

CustomData* GetCustomData (   ) 
 

Return pointer to the sprite control CustomData class object.

Returns:
Return pointer to the sprite control CustomData class object. Next CustomData class object will be linked to this data. If no CustomData class object attached than return NULL.

DWord GetFlags (   ) 
 

Return control render sprite flags.

Returns:
Return control render sprite flags. By default only Visible flag is set.

Return pointer to next sprite control linked to this sprite control.

Int  x_y

void InitFlags (  DWord  flags_  ) 
 

Set control render sprite flags.

Warning! Sixteen hi bits reserved for system.

Parameters:
flags_ define new control render sprite flags.

Bool IsVisible (   ) 
 

Check is sprite visible.

Invisible sprites will be not rendered.

Returns:
Return True if sprite visible flag is set else False.

void Move (  Short  x,
Short  y
) 
 

Move sprite position on global screen map.

Parameters:
x define x move for top left sprite position on global screen map.
y define y move for top left sprite position on global screen map.

void Rotate (  Fixed  angle  ) 
 

Add new rotation to sprite rotate angle on global screen map.

Parameters:
angle define new additional rotate angle in Fixed degrees.

void Scale (  Fixed  x,
Fixed  y
) 
 

Set new sprite scale on global screen map.

Default value is (1,1). Set scale value for x or y to negative value equivalents to flip sprite image by x or y direction with positive scaling.

Parameters:
x define x new sprite scale on global screen map.
y define y new sprite scale on global screen map.

void Set (  Sprite2D *  sprite_,
Int  SpriteCenterEqualRotateCenter = 1
) 
 

Performs the complete initialization of SpriteTransform class object.

This function must be called before any operations on Sprite2D render transformations. Please don't delete or change Sprite2D class object while sending this SpriteTransform class object to draw queue. Only after Render2D::Flush() you can safely delete Sprite2D class object.

Parameters:
sprite_ Sprite2D class object pointer.
SpriteCenterEqualRotateCenter if True for rotate operation will be used sprite center else top left sprite point will be center of rotation.

void SetAlpha (  Byte  alpha_  ) 
 

Set new alpha transparent value for sprite.

Default value is 255.

Parameters:
alpha_ define alpha value from 0 absolute transparent to 255 absolute opaque.

void SetAngle (  Fixed  angle  ) 
 

Set new sprite rotate angle on global screen map.

Default value is 0.

Parameters:
angle define new rotate angle in Fixed degrees.

void SetColorMask (  Pixel  color_mask_  ) 
 

Default value is white.

Parameters:
color_mask_ define new color mask value.

void SetCustomData (  CustomData *  custom_data_  ) 
 

Set pointer to sprite control CustomData class object.

Only pointer will be saved and not any memory will be used to store CustomData class object. You should keep CustomData class object data alive until this sprite control not be deleted.

Parameters:
custom_data pointer to CustomData class object for this sprite control.

void SetFlag (  Int  f  ) 
 

Set one specified control render sprite flag.

Parameters:
f define specified control render sprite flag to set.

void SetName (  const Char *  name  ) 
 

Set ASCII name for this sprite control.

Only pointer will be saved and not any memory will be used to store ASCII name. You should keep ASCII name data alive until this sprite control not be deleted.

Parameters:
name pointer to ASCII name for this sprite control.

void SetNext (  SpriteTransform *  st  ) 
 

Set pointer to next sprite control linked to this sprite control.

Only pointer will be saved and not any memory will be used to store next sprite control. You should keep next sprite control data alive until this sprite control not be deleted.

Parameters:
st pointer to next sprite control linked to this sprite control.

void SetRotateCenter (  Short  x,
Short  y
) 
 

Set new sprite rotate center in sprite coordinates.

Parameters:
x define x new sprite rotate center position.
y define y new sprite rotate center position.

void SetShadow (  Byte  shadow_  ) 
 

Set new shadow value for sprite.

Default value is 0.

Parameters:
shadow_ define new shadow value.

void SetTime (  Short  time_  ) 
 

Set sprite animation playtime in frames.

Only usable for animations.

Parameters:
time_ define new sprite animation playtime in frames.

void SetType (  Int  type_  ) 
 

Set user defined type value.

Parameters:
type_ define new user defined type value.

void SetVisible (  Bool  visible  ) 
 

Set sprite visible flag.

Parameters:
visible define new value for sprite visible flag. If True than sprite visible flag will be set else clear it.

void SetZOrder (  Int  z_order_  ) 
 

Set new z order for sprite.

Parameters:
z_order_ define new z order for sprite. Sprites with most biggest z order will be displayed on top of all.

void Translate (  Short  x,
Short  y
) 
 

Set new sprite position on global screen map.

Parameters:
x define x top left new sprite position on global screen map.
y define y top left new sprite position on global screen map.

void UpDate (   ) 
 

Update sprite bounding box.

Need to call after any of Set(), Translate(), Move(), Scale(), SetAngle(), Rotate(), SetRotateCenter(). For speed optimization do first all transformations and than call only one UpDate().
